abstract.t: This document defines SigComp, a solution for compressing messagesgenerated by application protocols such as SIP [RFC-2543] and RTSP[RFC-2326]. The architecture and pre-requisites of SigComp areoutlined, along with the format of the SigComp message.Decompression functionality for SigComp is provided by a 'UniversalDecompressor Virtual Machine' optimized for the task of runningdecompression algorithms. The UDVM can be configured to understandthe output of many well-known compressors such as DEFLATE [RFC-1951].
